name: Candle Burner
overview: Candle Burner is a fun little timed Christmas themed game in which your goal is to light all the candles on a Christmas tree in an attempt to get on the top 5 "Burners" list by beating one of the top five scores. Once you light one candle, you must return to the base candle to light your match again. The game was released as part of the RGCD C64 16KB Cartridge Game Development Competition 2013.
